Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos with handle start on left; white slip; interior: reserved band around rim and glazed streaky black below; trace of added white band below; exterior, thin brown line at edge of rim and reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis (Williams 1983, 169). Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983.
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 167, no. 103)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 724, no. 828)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1828) (phase 2)
